Control Statement: The organization:a. Determines mean time to failure (MTTF) for [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] in specific environments of operation; andb. Provides substitute information system components and a means to exchange active and standby components at [Assignment: organization-defined MTTF substitution criteria].
